item.title: 美国政府 1 月份新增 9,000 个工作岗位，预计不会持续增长
item.description: 1 月份美国政府新增了 9000 名工作人员，由于唐纳德-特朗普总统希望裁减联邦工作人员，经济学家预计未来几个月不会再看到这一增长。【原文：The U.S. government added 9,000 workers in January, a gain economists do not expect to see repeated in the months ahead as President Donald Trump looks to cull the ranks of the federal workforce.】

item.title: 独家报道产量减少，委内瑞拉 PDVSA 恢复轻质原油进口
item.description: 根据公司文件和船只跟踪数据，委内瑞拉国家石油公司 PDVSA 已恢复定期进口轻质原油，因为该公司自身的中质和轻质原油产量不断减少，为生产可出口的混合原油制造了瓶颈。【原文：Venezuela's state oil company PDVSA has resumed regular imports of light crude as its own output of medium and light grades dwindles, creating bottlenecks for producing exportable blends, according to company documents and vessel tracking data.】

item.title: 泰坦美国公司估值近 30 亿美元，纽交所首日股价上涨 1.25
item.description: 泰坦美国公司的股票在纽约证券交易所首次亮相时上涨了 1.25%，使这家总部位于比利时的水泥生产商的市值达到 29.9 亿美元。【原文：Shares of Titan America rose 1.25% in their debut on the New York Stock Exchange, giving the Belgium-based cement producer a market capitalization of $2.99 billion.】

item.title: 在关税压力下，锋利笔制造商纽威品牌公司努力减少对华依赖
item.description: 纽威品牌公司（Newell Brands）的首席执行官周五表示，该公司正致力于减少对中国供应商的依赖，以尽量减少美国进口关税的影响。【原文：Newell Brands' CEO said on Friday it is aiming to reduce its reliance on Chinese suppliers to minimize the impact of U.S. import tariffs, following its unexpected quarterly loss forecast.】

item.title: OpenAI 的 Altman 为欧洲设想了类似 "星际之门 "的计划
item.description: OpenAI 首席执行官山姆-奥特曼（Sam Altman）周五表示，愿意将类似 "星际之门 "的人工智能项目引入欧洲，并称他的公司 "非常愿意 "在欧洲开展 "星际之门 "项目。【原文：OpenAI CEO Sam Altman on Friday signaled willingness to bring a Stargate-like artificial intelligence program to Europe, saying his company would "love" to do a Stargate Europe.】

item.title: 摩托罗拉上诉英国紧急服务网络案遭拒
item.description: 英国反垄断监管机构认定摩托罗拉在向英国紧急服务部门提供通信服务的合同中赚取了 "超常 "利润，但摩托罗拉被拒绝上诉。【原文：Motorola was refused permission to appeal against the British antitrust regulator's findings that it was making "supernormal" profits on its contract to provide communications to Britain's emergency services.】

item.title: 亚马逊从年报中删除多元化内容，企业纷纷缩减 DEI
item.description: 亚马逊公司（Amazon.com）周四提交的年度报告中取消了 "包容性和多样性 "的提法，而在此之前的 12 月份，亚马逊曾告诉员工，公司正在逐步减少多样性项目，这是美国企业从此类政策中广泛撤退的一部分。【原文：Amazon.com eliminated a reference to "inclusion and diversity" in its annual report filed on Thursday, after telling employees in December that it was winding down diversity programs as part of corporate America's broader retreat from such policies.】

item.title: 美联储货币政策报告标榜美国经济稳健发展
item.description: 美联储最新发布的《货币政策报告》称，美国经济状况稳健，货币政策立场将受新的经济数据驱动。【原文：The Federal Reserve's latest Monetary Policy Report describes the U.S. economy as being in a solid position amid a monetary policy stance that will be driven by incoming economic data.】

item.title: 独家消息消息人士：特朗普告诉共和党议员，他计划最早于周五宣布对等关税措施
item.description: 两位熟悉计划的消息人士告诉路透社，唐纳德-特朗普总统告诉共和党议员，他计划最早于周五宣布对等关税。【原文：President Donald Trump told Republican lawmakers that he plans to announce reciprocal tariffs as early as Friday, two sources familiar with the plans told Reuters.】

item.title: 交易员认为美联储今年只会降息一次
item.description: 周五，短期利率期货交易者目前预计美联储今年只会降息一次，而不再像早些时候那样押注从6月开始降息两次，此前政府数据显示劳动力市场依然强劲，而且一项受到密切关注的调查显示消费者的通胀预期有所上升。【原文：Traders of short-term interest-rate futures on Friday now expect the Federal Reserve to cut interest rates just one time this year, backing away from earlier bets on two rate cuts starting in June, after government data showed the labor market remains strong and a closely-watched survey showed a jump in consumers' inflation expectations.】

item.title: 美国消费者信心下降，通胀预期飙升
item.description: 美国消费者情绪在2月份意外下跌至7个月来的最低点，通胀预期急剧上升，因为家庭担心，要避免唐纳德-特朗普总统威胁征收关税对其购买力造成的负面影响可能为时已晚。【原文：U.S. consumer sentiment dropped unexpectedly in February to a seven-month low and inflation expectations rocketed as households feared it may be too late to avoid the negative effects on their purchasing power from President Donald Trump's threatened tariffs.】

item.title: 独家消息消息人士称，OpenAI 联合创始人 Sutskever 的 SSI 公司正在商谈估值 200 亿美元事宜
item.description: 四位消息人士告诉路透社，OpenAI 前首席科学家伊利亚-苏茨克沃（Ilya Sutskever）去年联合创办的人工智能初创公司 Safe Superintelligence 正在洽谈融资，估值至少为 200 亿美元。【原文：Safe Superintelligence, an artificial intelligence startup co-founded by OpenAI's former chief scientist Ilya Sutskever last year, is in talks to raise funding at a valuation of at least $20 billion, four sources told Reuters.】

item.title: 诺基亚赢得德国法院对亚马逊流媒体专利的裁决
item.description: 德国一家法院周五裁定，亚马逊侵犯了芬兰网络设备制造商诺基亚的一项视频流专利。【原文：A German court ruled on Friday that Amazon has violated a video streaming patent owned by Finnish network equipment maker Nokia .】

item.title: 美联储卡什卡利认为 2025 年底政策利率将 "小幅下调
item.description: 明尼阿波利斯联邦储备银行行长尼尔-卡什卡利（Neel Kashkari）周五表示，周五公布的最新数据显示劳动力市场强劲，如果通胀继续降温，美国央行的政策利率到年底将比现在 "适度 "降低。【原文：Minneapolis Federal Reserve Bank President Neel Kashkari on Friday said fresh data published Friday shows the labor market is strong, and if inflation continues to cool, the U.S. central bank's policy rate will be "modestly" lower by the end of the year than now.】

item.title: 人工智能广告工具推动 Pinterest 股价大涨
item.description: Pinterest 预测第一季度营收高于预期，表明其人工智能工具将刺激图片分享平台上的广告支出，该公司股价周五上涨 20%。【原文：Pinterest's shares rose 20% on Friday as it forecast first-quarter revenue above estimates, indicating that its AI-powered tools would spur ad spend on the image sharing platform.】

item.title: 投资团体反对特朗普的结转利息增税计划
item.description: 私募投资行业组织美国投资委员会（AIC）周五建议，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普不应关闭一个允许私募股权和对冲基金金融家为其大部分收入支付较低资本利得税的漏洞。【原文：Private investment industry group American Investment Council (AIC) suggested on Friday that U.S. President Donald Trump should not close a loophole that allows private equity and hedge fund financiers to pay a lower capital gains tax rate on much of their income.】

item.title: ISS 建议苹果投资者投票反对考虑废除 DEI 政策的提议
item.description: 机构股东服务公司（Institutional Shareholder Services）周五建议苹果公司股东投票反对一项投资者提案，该提案要求这家科技巨头考虑废除其多元化、公平和包容政策。【原文：Proxy advisory firm Institutional Shareholder Services on Friday recommended that Apple shareholders vote against an investor proposal asking the tech giant to consider abolishing its diversity, equity and inclusion policies.】

item.title: 美国就业数据喜忧参半，美元反弹，期货下跌
item.description: 周五的数据显示，美国经济在 1 月份创造的就业岗位少于预期，但在 12 月份创造的就业岗位多于最初的预期，这使得利率前景基本保持不变。【原文：Wall Street futures fell and the dollar rose after data on Friday showed the U.S. economy generated fewer jobs than expected in January, but more than initially thought in December, leaving the outlook for rates more or less unchanged.】

item.title: VIEW 1月份薪资增长乏力不太可能动摇美联储的决心
item.description: 美国 1 月份的就业增长放缓幅度超过预期，这很可能是受到加州野火和全国大部分地区寒冷天气的影响，但 4.0% 的失业率很可能使美联储有理由至少在 6 月份之前暂缓降息。【原文：U.S. job growth slowed more than expected in January, likely restrained by wildfires in California and cold weather across much of the country, but a 4.0% unemployment rate probably gives the Federal Reserve cover to hold off cutting interest rates at least until June.】

item.title: 美国 3 月份就业岗位增长下调 59.8 万个
item.description: 美国劳工部劳工统计局（BLS）周五表示，截至3月份的12个月中，美国经济创造的就业岗位比之前估计的少了59.8万个。【原文：The U.S. economy created 598,000 fewer jobs in the 12 months through March than previously estimated, the Labor Department's Bureau of Labor Statistics (BLS) said on Friday.】

item.title: 边疆公司预计 2025 年利润将因定价改善和旅游需求而增长
item.description: 受惠于价格环境改善带来的强劲旅游需求，廉价航空公司边疆航空公司的母公司边疆集团（Frontier Group）周五预计 2025 年利润将好于预期。【原文：Frontier Group , the parent of budget carrier Frontier Airlines, forecast better-than-expected 2025 profit on Friday, aided by robust travel demand amid an improved pricing environment.】

item.title: 就业数据公布后，交易员认为美联储将于 6 月降息
item.description: 在一份政府报告显示上个月美国失业率为 4% 之后，短期利率期货交易者继续押注美联储将在 6 月份下调政策利率。【原文：Traders of short-term interest-rate futures continue to bet the Federal Reserve will next cut its policy rate in June after a government report showed the U.S. unemployment rate was 4% last month.】

item.title: 美国 1 月份就业增长不及预期；失业率为 4.0
item.description: 美国 1 月份的就业增长放缓幅度超过预期，这很可能是受到加州野火和全国大部分地区寒冷天气的影响，但 4.0% 的失业率很可能使美联储有理由至少在 6 月份之前暂缓降息。【原文：U.S. job growth slowed more than expected in January, likely restrained by wildfires in California and cold weather across much of the country, but a 4.0% unemployment rate probably gives the Federal Reserve cover to hold off cutting interest rates at least until June.】

item.title: 独家报道智利科德尔科公司 2025 年铜产量目标为 139.1 万吨 - 文件
item.description: 根据路透社查阅的一份未公开的批准 2025 年预算的政府法令，全球最大的铜生产商智利国有矿业公司 Codelco 今年的目标是生产 139.1 万公吨红色金属。【原文：Chilean state miner Codelco, the world's largest copper producer, is targeting production of 1.391 million metric tons of the red metal this year, according to an unpublished government decree approving its 2025 budget reviewed by Reuters.】

item.title: 消息人士称雪佛龙加快哈萨克油田扩产步伐
item.description: 两位熟悉计划的消息人士告诉路透社，雪佛龙公司正在加快哈萨克斯坦 Tengiz 油田的扩建速度，将其产量提高到全球原油供应量的 1%左右。【原文：Chevron is speeding up its expansion of Kazakhstan's Tengiz oilfield, two sources familiar with the plans told Reuters, raising its output to around 1% of global crude supply.】

item.title: 英国《金融时报》报道：埃森哲取消多元化与包容性目标
item.description: 英国《金融时报》周五援引埃森哲首席执行官朱莉-斯威特（Julie Sweet）给公司员工的备忘录报道称，埃森哲在对美国政治格局进行评估后，取消了其全球多元化和包容性目标。【原文：Accenture has scrapped its global diversity and inclusion goals after an evaluation of the U.S. political landscape, the Financial Times reported on Friday, citing a memo to the company's staff from CEO Julie Sweet.】

item.title: 独家报道消息称保乐力加考虑出售慕姆香槟
item.description: 据五位熟知内情的消息人士透露，保乐力加正在探索出售旗下香槟品牌 G.H. Mumm，因为保乐力加希望把重点放在其产品组合中的高端品牌上。【原文：Pernod Ricard is exploring a sale of its champagne brand G.H. Mumm, according to five sources familiar with the matter, as it looks to focus on premium labels in its portfolio.】

item.title: 对冲活动激增，交易所运营商 Cboe 季度利润攀升
item.description: 交易所运营商 Cboe Global Markets 周五公布，由于投资者寻求对冲风险，期权交易增加，第四季度调整后利润有所增长。【原文：Exchange operator Cboe Global Markets reported a rise in fourth-quarter adjusted profit on Friday, driven by increased options trading as investors sought to hedge risks.】

item.title: Affirm 业绩飙升，因为强劲的假日购物推动 BNPL 贷款公司超出预期
item.description: Affirm 周五在盘前交易中股价大涨 16%，此前这家 "先买后付 "贷款公司在假日购物旺季的支持下公布了令人惊喜的季度利润，并预测全年收入将保持乐观。【原文：Affirm shares jumped 16% in premarket trading on Friday, after the buy now, pay later lender posted a surprise quarterly profit on the back of a strong holiday shopping season and forecast an upbeat annual revenue.】

item.title: 尽管美国关税紧张，墨西哥牛油果出口在超级碗比赛前保持稳定
item.description: 墨西哥牛油果种植者将在周日的超级碗比赛前向美国运送约 110,000 公吨的 "绿色黄金 "水果，因为美国威胁要征收的关税在生效前被暂停，而这些关税可能会使出口脱轨。【原文：Mexican avocado growers will ship about 110,000 metric tons of the "green gold" fruit to the United States ahead of Sunday's Super Bowl, as threatened U.S. tariffs that could have derailed exports were paused before taking effect.】
